entries.title: Valve's working on HDR for Linux gaming, paving the way for an eventual OLED Steam Deck
entries.description: Or maybe just a really nice feature for Linux gamers. That'd be cool too.

entries.title: Assassin's Creed live-action Netflix series loses its showrunner
entries.description: Jeb Stuart, whose credits range from Die Hard to Vikings: Valhalla, joined the Netflix series in 2021.

entries.title: Buy Hitman 3 for $21 right now and you'll get the first two games for free
entries.description: The cheapest way to get the entire Hitman trilogy for the foreseeable future.

entries.title: Super Lesbian Animal RPG is a big hit with the target audience
entries.description: They call it SLARPG.

entries.title: Moddb's 'Mod of the Year' is the best Half-Life 2 campaign since Half-Life 2
entries.description: Players also voted for mods for Stalker, Counter-Strike, and a mod that turns Doom fully 3D.

entries.title: ZeniMax employees vote to form the biggest videogame union in the US
entries.description: Microsoft has already recognized the union and says it looks forward to "good faith negotiations."

entries.title: 15 hidden gems to grab before the Steam Winter Sale ends
entries.description: All of these games came out in 2022 and deserve a spot in your library.

entries.title: Destiny 2 dataminers admit leaked subscription plan was a hoax: 'We trolled everyone'
entries.description: An admin of a popular Destiny 2 Discord apologized for the report, saying it was not meant to be malicious.

entries.title: Asus Zephyrus gaming laptops are getting a 'maxed out' makeover for CES 2023
entries.description: These souped-up gaming machines all come with increased screen space and boatloads of configuration options.

entries.title: Twitch is coming back online after an outage
entries.description: Everything should be back to normal, but some may still see loading issues.

entries.title: Prime subscribers can grab one of our favourite survival horror games free to keep right now
entries.description: A DRM-free version of The Evil Within 2 is just a sign-in away.

entries.title: Asus announces its RTX 40-series ROG Strix gaming laptop lineup
entries.description: New ROG's lookin' POG.

entries.title: Nvidia announces that Atomic Heart and Witchfire will support DLSS 3 at launch
entries.description: Nvidia's fancy AI-powered framerate booster will support upcoming titles like Atomic Heart, The Day Before, and Witchfire.

entries.title: This new AI tool upscales 1080p videos to 4K on RTX 40-series and 30-series GPUs
entries.description: Nvidia calls it RTX Video Super Resolution, and it's coming in February.

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4090-powered gaming laptops will launch on February 8 starting at $1,999
entries.description: Yes, Nvidia has managed to jam the RTX 4090 into a laptop, but there will be more affordable options coming February 22 starting at $999.

entries.title: Acer is joining the OLED party with a pair of speedy 240Hz displays
entries.description: You, too, can have a large predator in your bedroom.

entries.title: Alienware now makes 14-inch and 18-inch gaming laptops
entries.description: From 14 inches to 18 inches, Alienware has got a laptop that's small enough to fit in your bag or big enough to take over your desk completely.

entries.title: I'm afraid Alienware's new 500Hz gaming monitor won't make me any better at shooters
entries.description: And so the high refresh rate wars has begun.

entries.title: Nvidia has finally announced the $799 RTX 4070 Ti launching Jan 5
entries.description: Promising the third-tier Ada GPU will "Max out your 1440p gaming monitor."

entries.title: Nvidia bringing RTX 4080s to GeForce Now with DLSS 3 and 240Hz mode support
entries.description: Nvidia's new game streaming tier also has a 240Hz competitive mode.

entries.title: Hitman 3 is becoming Hitman: World of Assassination, with all content rolled into one big game
entries.description: The major change is slated to take place on January 26.

entries.title: Dropzone creator Archer MacLean dies aged 60
entries.description: One of the few developers to succeed at getting his name on the box.

entries.title: Russian officials are considering a 'Russian Electronic Arts' to save the country's crumbling games industry
entries.description: A Russian EA was one of many ideas floated at a December meeting of government officials and tech sector representatives.

entries.title: Fnatic x ChopValue Revive Pro recycled gaming desk
entries.description: Made with recycled chopsticks!

entries.title: The System Shock remake shows off the results of its 'staggering' work on dismemberment
entries.description: And locks in the launch window of March 2023.

entries.title: This funky-looking controller is at the center of Alienware's prototype home game streaming ecosystem
entries.description: Concept Nyx wants you to stop fighting over the TV.

entries.title: Intel's new $196 16-thread Core i5 is an awesome reason to upgrade from an older CPU
entries.description: Holy moly, the Core i5 13400F looks to be one helluva gaming chip.

entries.title: Intel's new 24-core i9 13950HX gaming laptop chip runs at a meteoric 5.6GHz
entries.description: That's a lot of processing power for a compact laptop, eh?

entries.title: Cheaper, power-savvy versions of Intel's excellent Raptor Lake CPUs are here
entries.description: The Core i9 13900 will cost you around $549, according to Intel. That's $40 less than the Core i9 13900K, in theory.

entries.title: Samsung's G9 mega-monitor range just got more confusing thanks to new dual-4K and OLED models
entries.description: Yet another Neo G9 is joined by the OLED G9.

entries.title: Happy new year everyone: Square Enix still loves the blockchain!
entries.description: Can't it just stick to overpriced Final Fantasy merch.

entries.title: Racer improved 1000% by mod that replaces supercars with man in dolly cart
entries.description: Or a shopping trolley, or Santa's sleigh, or your legs.

entries.title: How to watch Nvidia's CES keynote today
entries.description: RTX 4070 Ti, mobile GPUs and more likely to be announced at 8am PST, 9am MST, 10am CST and 11am EST.

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti reportedly launches Thursday at $799
entries.description: Nvidia accidentally confirms specs, identical to unlaunched RTX 4080 12GB

entries.title: Today's Wordle 563 answer and hint for Tuesday, January 3
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #563 puzzle.
